languages.text: Когда это существо наносит {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} противникам, их {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броня{/g} сокращается на 10%, а {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражение{/g} — на 1. Также они получают психосоматическую {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}травму{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Whenever this creature deals damage to enemies, those enemies suffer −10% armour and −1 deflection and gain a psychosomatic trauma.

traits.locale_text: Cuando esta criatura daña a sus enemigos, los enemigos además sufren −10 % de {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armadura{/g}, −1 de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} y una {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}aflicción{/g} psicosomática.

languages.text: 每当此生物对敌人造成{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}时，目标都会获得−10%{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}与-1{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}，并获得精神{g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}创伤{/g}效果。
languages.original_text: Whenever this creature deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to enemies, those enemies suffer −10% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and −1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} and gain a psychosomatic {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}trauma{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 每当此生物对敌人造成伤害时，目标都会获得-10%{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}护甲{/g}与-1{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}，并获得精神{g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}创伤{/g}。

languages.text: Chaque fois que cette créature inflige des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} à des ennemis, ces derniers subissent −10 % d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} et −1 de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g}, et reçoivent l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}Traumatisme{/g} psychosomatique.
languages.original_text: Whenever this creature deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to enemies, those enemies suffer −10% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and −1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} and gain a psychosomatic {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}trauma{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que cette créature inflige des dégâts à des ennemis, ces derniers subissent -10 % d'{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armure{/g} et -1 de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g}, et reçoivent l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}Traumatisme{/g} Psychosomatique.

languages.text: Wenn diese Kreatur Feinden {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} zufügt, haben Letztere −10 % {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} und −1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Ablenkung{/g}. Außerdem erleiden sie ein psychosomatisches {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}Trauma{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever this creature deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to enemies, those enemies suffer −10% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and −1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} and gain a psychosomatic {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}trauma{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Wann immer dieser Kreatur Feinden Schaden zufügt, erleiden diese Feinde −10 % {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}Rüstung{/g} und −1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Deflektion{/g}. Außerdem erleiden sie ein psychosomatisches {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}Trauma{/g}.

languages.text: この生物が敵に{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与える場合、敵は{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g} −10%および{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}ディフレクション{/g} −1の減少のほか、心身の{g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}外傷{/g}を受ける。
languages.original_text: Whenever this creature deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to enemies, those enemies suffer −10% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and −1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} and gain a psychosomatic {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}trauma{/g}.

traits.locale_text: この生物が敵にダメージを与える場合、敵は{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}アーマー{/g} −10%および{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏向{/g} −1の減少のほか、心身の{g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}トラウマ{/g}を受ける。

languages.text: Bu yaratığın {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verdiği düşmanlar, −%10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırh{/g} ve −1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}saptırma{/g} değerine maruz kalırlar. Ayrıca ruhsezi {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}travmasına{/g} uğrarlar.
languages.original_text: Whenever this creature deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to enemies, those enemies suffer −10% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and −1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} and gain a psychosomatic {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}trauma{/g}.
